doc:
John Byner https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Byner 0 John Byner (born John Biener; June 28, 1938) is an American actor, comedian, and impressionist who has had a lengthy television and movie career. His voice work includes the cartoon series The Ant and the Aardvark, in which the title characters are voiced by Byner's impressions of Dean Martin and Jackie Mason, respectively. John_Byner ( born John_Biener ; June_28_,_1938 ) is an_American_actor , comedian , and impressionist who has_had a_lengthy_television_and_movie_career . His_voice_work includes the_cartoon_series The_Ant and the_Aardvark , in which the_title_characters are_voiced by Byner 's_impressions of Dean_Martin and Jackie_Mason , respectively .
